channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: New Threat Actor Intel Profiles Added to Defender TI
item.description:
The Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence (Defender TI) team has recently launched twenty-six new threat actor Intel Profiles and more than 50 additional articles customers can leverage immediately to take an intel-led approach to defend their organization from the latest threats.
Intel Profiles are a single source of information that fully licensed security operations teams can use for instant insight into the threat ecosystem. Users can rapidly identify adversary-threat infrastructure and access actionable indicators of compromise (IOCs) and in-depth analysis of tools, tactics, and proce...
